players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Charlie was the one found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye on each other."
Bob: "I agree with Diana. We should all keep a close eye on each other after last night's events."
Diana: "I'm concerned about Alice's silence during the first discussion round. It's important that we all communicate openly to ensure everyone's safety."
Bob: "I believe Alice is the mafioso based on my investigation during night 1. It's crucial that we work together to identify and eliminate the threat in our midst."
You: "I will not make any accusations or comments about who I think the mafioso might be. Instead, I'll focus on maintaining a neutral stance and trying to gather more information."
